Enum BIQUAD_FILTER_TYPE¶

  • Defined in File dm_fx_effects_defines.h

Enum Documentation¶

enum BIQUAD_FILTER_TYPE¶

: Type of biquad filter

YTIDrkwS6vigSyEDITY

Values:

BIQUAD_TYPE_LPF¶

Low-pass filter

BIQUAD_TYPE_HPF¶

High-pass filter

BIQUAD_TYPE_BPF¶

Band-pass filter

BIQUAD_TYPE_NOTCH¶

Notch filter

BIQUAD_TYPE_PEAKING¶

Peaking filter (used in parametric filters)

BIQUAD_TYPE_L_SHELF¶

Low shelf

BIQUAD_TYPE_H_SHELF¶

High shelf

BIQUAD_TYPE_TOTAL¶
